import sys

n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
a, b = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

ans = 0

while n != 1:
    if n % k == 0:
        n = n // k
        ans += b
    else:
        n -= 1
        ans += a

print(ans)

import sys

n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
a, b = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

ans = 0
while n != 1:
    if n % k == 0:
        n = n // k
        ans += b
    else:
        n -= 1
        ans += a

print(ans)

import math
import os
import random
import re
import sys



if __name__ == '__main__':
    nk = input().split()

    n = int(nk[0])

    k = int(nk[1])

    a = int(input())

    b = int(input())

    x = n

    ans = 0

    while x != 1:

        if x % k == 0:

            x = x // k

            ans += b

        else:

            x -= 1

            ans += a

    print(ans)
